snippet: Olympic tennis silver medalist Juan Martin del Potro of Argentina has received a wild card into this month's U.S. Open, which could be bad news for one of the top 32 seeds....
lead_paragraph: Olympic tennis silver medalist Juan Martin del Potro of Argentina has received a wild card into this month's U.S. Open, which could be bad news for one of the top 32 seeds.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Gets Wild Card for U.S. Open
headline.main: Del Potro Gets Wild Card for U.S. Open
